LinesAnswers.name: initial
LinesAnswers.line: Good evening, passenger passing through. Tell me where are you going in such a hurry? Ah, well, that's not important, I guess. It's a long ride for all for all of us, let's spend some time playing cards, shall we? Have a seat, it's all right here, 'according to concepts'.

responses.response: Great idea, it's been a while since I played, but no big deal.

LinesAnswers.name: won1stTime
LinesAnswers.line: Here was a game, I lost, but we're fair - here are the winnings. Well, we warmed up a bit, let's play another game. We're having a good rest, and who's to say I'm wrong? Ha-ha...

responses.response: Wow, it's amazing, let's keep playing.
We've played enough, I don't like the atmosphere here, it's time to move on.

LinesAnswers.name: lost2ndTime
LinesAnswers.line: That time - I'll tell you, I just had a good card. In short, it's a fancy morning. Give me the money back, and let's move on. You're about to get lucky, boy!

responses.response: No thanks, I'm sick of it.
Eh, I want to win back, give up the cards.

LinesAnswers.name: gameOver
LinesAnswers.line: Oh, boy! It's my lucky day, boy. Give me the cash! What do you mean, no money?! Why did you sit down to play? You're gonna pay for this, you little punk!

LinesAnswers.name: rejectedAfter2ndPlay
LinesAnswers.line: Tired of it? Go away, kid, and don't mess around.

LinesAnswers.name: rejectedAfter1stPlay
LinesAnswers.line: You are in trouble! Pretzel on a stick, you think you've got the wheels rolling? Don't dare to speak to me again!
